name: Ework Slider
author: Puspa Raj Joshi

sections.description:
This is the flexslider plugin for wordpress users. Simple easy to use slider plugin. Upload the images in media section and copy the url to the fields. You prefer the screenshot to implement.

Arbitrary section

A brief Of Ework slider Plugin
sections.installation:
Installation process is too simple its been installed by two method

1st method:
Just download the zip file and extract it into the plugins folder. After then you will see the slider link in the admin
. Go on the top link in the screenshot 2 and 3 add data as shown in screenshot then on the list (i.e in screenshot 3) you will see this in shortcode [ework_slider id='17' /] copy this code and pest in the post or pages in the editor. Thats it you can see the slider on that page.

2nd method:
If you need to call the slider with id then you just need to write this function ework_display_slider and the parameter are passed like this. <?php $id = array('id'=>'19'); echo ework_display_slider($id);?>

short_description: Flexslider simple and easy to use with fade and slide effect, these can be arranged from admin.
